description: Plate, shallow, decorated in center with a medallion carrying a profile unicorn in strong orange yellow outlined with blue, surrounding this a band of large diapered leaves alternating with branching stems in white on the buff ground, rim decorated with a band of overlapping scales, outlined in blue on orange ground, and bordered within by band of checkered pattern in red, green, and blue; Dia. 10-1/4 in.
title: Plate
